repositories.name: ml-foundations
repositories.description: Andrew Ng ML Specialization notes, notebooks, and cheat-sheets
repositories.short_description: Hands-on notebooks implementing core ML algorithms with evaluations and plots.

repositories.name: phishing-classifier
repositories.description: ML fundamentals project using UCI Phishing dataset
repositories.short_description: Supervised model to detect phishing: EDA, features, baselines, metrics.

repositories.name: secure-ai-api
repositories.description: FastAPI backend serving classifier and RAG endpoints with security best practices
repositories.short_description: FastAPI service for RAG + inference with OAuth2/JWT, rate limiting, Docker, CI/CD.

repositories.name: ai-chat-rag
repositories.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline integrating LangChain and vector DB
repositories.short_description: Flutter RAG chat with streaming UI (Riverpod + GetIt), connects to Secure AI API.

repositories.name: flutter-iam
repositories.description: Reusable Flutter package for IAM (Okta / Azure AD)
repositories.short_description: Flutter OIDC/OAuth2 package: login, token refresh, Dio interceptors.

repositories.name: api-showcase
repositories.description: Flutter API demo app (currently Pexels API, later Secure AI API)
repositories.short_description: Flutter API client patterns: BLoC, Dio, pagination, caching (Pexels demo).

repositories.name: ai-cyber-security-roadmap
repositories.description: This roadmap tracker and manifest powering the portfolio
repositories.short_description: Single-source roadmap + manifest powering the live CV and badges.
